!Trader Casey: Uncle Sabrin thinks life is about making as much money as you can, but I don't agree. I think you should do something to impress the world. I know I'm selling goods right now, but I'll soon be leaving. I plan to try my luck in Aden, among all the great castles and magnificent buildings.
